== Main Inclusion Report for Facile ==

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability:'' <nowiki>[[http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/f/facile]]</nowiki>; available on all architectures
# ''Rationale:''
** Needed for Kalzium(KDE4) equation solver, which is one of the most important feature of Kalzium
0. ''Security:''
** No CVE entries
** No secunia history
** No binaries running as root or suid/sgid. 
** Doesn't open any port
0. ''Quality assurance:''
** Package work out of the box without configuration
** <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/src:facile|Debian bugs]]</nowiki>: no showstoppers
** <nowiki>[[http://packages.qa.debian.org/f/facile.html|Maintenance in Debian]]</nowiki> by the OCaml team, not really active, but the last release of Facile is old
** <nowiki>[[http://www.recherche.enac.fr/opti/facile|Upstream]]</nowiki> is not active(but the webpage was updated in July), as said above
** No bug tracker, just a mail address: facileATrechercheDOTenacDOTfr
** Test suite is available by running "make check", not ran in the build
0. ''Standards compliance:'' 
** Meet the <nowiki>[[http://www.pathname.com/fhs/|FHS]]</nowiki> and <nowiki>[[http://www.de.debian.org/doc/debian-policy/|Debian Policy]]</nowiki>
** Packaged with cdbs, patch system is dpatch
0. ''Dependencies:''
** OCaml
